title: Sales Account Executive (m/f/x) - ISG Personalmanagement
subtitle: Graz, ST
body:
Unsere Recruitingprojekte laufen weiter. Wir freuen uns auf Ihre Bewerbung und die Aktualisierungen Ihrer Angaben im ISG-Karriereportal!

Wir sind uneingeschränkt im Home-Office verfügbar.

Our client is an Austrian based company with an innovative approach to scalable cloud video-conferencing solutions. The company is highly rated by Gartner. They create solutions that make a change and use modern technologies to craft real-time experiences for B2B and B2C markets. The company is headquartered in Graz. Working from Vienna region is also welcome.

Sales Account Executive (m/f/x)

Your Role & Responsibilty
  • Account management and upselling based on existing client base
  • Reaching out to clients via video call
  • Holding sales webinars and expanding the sales network
  • Following up with prospects throughout the sales cycle to ensure needs are being met
  • Presenting and demonstrating the value of products and services to prospective buyers
  • Building long-lasting, mutually beneficial relationships with external contacts and internal departments to create a better customer experience
  • Occasional travel to fairs, conferences, seminars and exhibitions
  • Monitoring of sales figures


Your Skills & Experience
  • Passion for technology and for being part of a fast-growing SaaS company
  • Driven, self-motivated, enthusiastic and with a “can do” attitude
  • Experience in working online with multi-divisional, multi-geographical customers
  • Experience in working with cross-functional teams (e.g. Sales, Product, Marketing, Services)
  • Strong communication skills in English
  • Comfortable in a startup environment (move quickly and wear many hats in a dynamic environment)
Our Offer
  • Full or part-time employment
  • Room for personal and professional development
  • Working in a fast-growing company with international customers
  • Motivated and agile team with a common vision and a flat hierarchy
  • Headquarters in Austria
  • The minimum salary for this position is € 2.392 gross on a full-time basis (14x) acc. § 15 I. (11) ST1 acc. the Collective Agreement for Information Technology. Depending on your qualifications and experience, you will be offered an attractive salary.

If you are interested in this attractive career opportunity, please submit your application for ID Number 79.072 on ISG-CareerPortal or send an eMail.

Visit www.isg.com/jobs to find daily new job offers.
